summary: Turning the wimpy cowards into psycho sovereigns.
descriptionHtml:
If, like me, you rush to the aid of our furry brethren, or sadden when you see dead foxes in the wilds of Skyrim, this mod is for you. This mod converts those weak, frightened canids into fierce nightmares.

If you\'re a fox hunter looking for a challenge, go elsewhere. Foxes in this mod ignore crimes against their faction. Therefore don\'t attack the player if struck.

With this mod, foxes are buffed, confident, non-follower allies to the player.
Foxes will initiate combat against chickens, goats, rabbits and hunters, but will not attack anything else unless it is hostile against them, the player or the player\'s followers.

For those who liked the mass carnage of the previous version, simply spawn the foxes into the town as before, and hit a guard. Voila!  Utter chaos.

INSTALLATION:
-----------------------------
1. Download the most recent version.
2. Drag and drop into your Data folder.
3. Update the mod load list.
4. Enjoy your new and improved allies!

CHANGES:
-----------------------------
Stats:
Health = 2000
Health Regen = 500/sec
Stamina = 2500
Stamina Regen = 200/sec
HP Regen in Combat = Enabled
Unarmed Damage = 25

Alliances:
-----------------------------
Allies:
CurrentFollowerFaction
CurrentHireling
FoxFaction
PlayerFaction

Friends:
DismissedFollowerFaction
PlayerFollowerFaction
PotentialFollowerFaction

Enemies:
ChickenFaction
GoatFaction
HareFaction
HunterFaction
SprigganPredatorFaction

-----------------------------

NOTE: This is not a retexturing mod. The textures pictured here are from Real Foxes:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2764//?

NOTE: I am working on creating a side-along file to work with Shakespeare the Fox mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23414//?
